name: Sankari
description:
Sankari is a non-profit F2P 2D Platformer about a hero whose village gets raided by the evil king. The hero goes on a journey to free back the villagers that were captured and defeat the evil king.

Controls

Shift = Dash

WASD or Arrow Keys = Move Player / Move Map Icon

Space = Jump

Known Issues

- Level 3 has no way to exit the level

GitHub

https://github.com/Valks-Games/sankari

Join the Discord for updates on the game

https://discord.gg/5frafxrwwd
